# UITextPlaceholder

**Class**

A placeholder object that reserves visual space in a text input view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class UITextPlaceholder
```

## Accessing the selection rectangles

- **rects**

## Managing placeholders

- **insertTextPlaceholder(with:)**: Inserts a placeholder object to reserve visual space during text input.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes a placeholder object from the text input view.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
